description: Lists the organization nodes that have access to the specified portfolio. This API can only be called by the management account in the organization or by a delegated admin. If a delegated admin is de-registered, they can no longer perform this operation.

parameters.name: AcceptLanguage
parameters.description: The language code. jp - Japanese zh - Chinese.

parameters.name: PortfolioId
parameters.description: The portfolio identifier. For example, port-2abcdext3y5fk.

parameters.name: OrganizationNodeType
parameters.description: The organization node type that will be returned in the output. ORGANIZATION - Organization that has access to the portfolio. ORGANIZATIONAL_UNIT - Organizational unit that has access to the portfolio within your organization. ACCOUNT - Account that has access to the portfolio within your organization.

nested_items.name: OrganizationNodes
nested_items.description: Displays information about the organization nodes.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The identifier of the organization node.

nested_items.name: NextPageToken
nested_items.description: The page token to use to retrieve the next set of results. If there are no additional results, this value is null.
